headline.main: MURDER TRIAL.; Trial of Louis DeCorn for the Murder of Eugene Melville. Interesting Testimony. COURT OF OYER AND TERMINER. Before Hon. Judge Edwards. FIRST DAY.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Court was crowded at an early hour yesterdaymorning with citizens anxious to listen to the proceedings of this extraordinary trial. During the day be Corn manifested great uneasiness, and appeared to be laboring under much mental suffering.
docs.snippet: The Court was crowded at an early hour yesterdaymorning with citizens anxious to listen to the proceedings of this extraordinary trial. During the day be Corn manifested great uneasiness, and appeared to be laboring under much mental suffering.

docs.lead_paragraph: SUICIDE--Mr. A. C. Slow LL, residing at No. 120 State street, committed suicide about ? on, ?? yesterday, at the residence, by hanging himself by the neck rush a strap to the bedpost. headline.main: Death of the French Consel General.

docs.lead_paragraph: It is with acute regret as Frenchmen, and with the deepest personal emotion, that we take up our pen to confirm to our readers the mournful news of which the official notice placed at the head of our columns has already informed them.
docs.snippet: It is with acute regret as Frenchmen, and with the deepest personal emotion, that we take up our pen to confirm to our readers the mournful news of which the official notice placed at the head of our columns has already informed them.

headline.main: Naval Intelligence--Our Squadron in the East Indies.

docs.lead_paragraph: By the Balltic we receive from China private advises of the disposition of the ships composing our Squadron in the Eastern Seas. At Cum sing-muin, China, were the steamfrigates Susquchanna and Powhattan, corvettes Macedonian and Vandalia, and store-ship Southampton. At Whampoa, the steam-frigate
